doc.headline: Worth looking in to?
doc.post: Yesterday afternoon as I negotiated route 149 from Lake George to Fort Ann in NY I passed a new diner that had opened that day. I didnt notice the name but out side it had a Union Jack and a St Georges flag flying I wonder if they serve proper 'English' food, served by proper 'English' people ? I may have to check it out asap

Yesterday afternoon as I negotiated route 149 from Lake George to Fort Ann in NY I passed a new diner that had opened that day. I didnt notice the name but out side it had a Union Jack and a St Georges flag flying I wonder if they serve proper 'English' food, served by proper 'English' people ? I may have to check it out asap
If they don't have english food and beer...tell em they've got a bloody cheek flying the flags and luring un-suspecting expats in....little buggers...

Halal?
